thread.title: X Factor's 5 After Midnight singer Kieran Alleyne splits from girlfriend weeks before their baby is due
thread.title_full: X Factor's 5 After Midnight singer Kieran Alleyne splits from girlfriend weeks before their baby is due

author: Zoe Shenton
title: X Factor's 5 After Midnight singer Kieran Alleyne splits from girlfriend weeks before their baby is due
text:
X Factor's 5 After Midnight singer Kieran Alleyne splits from girlfriend weeks before their baby is due The X Factor star revealed girlfriend Sophie Johnson was pregnant back in October Share Over: Kieran and Sophie (Photo: Instagram) Share     
5 After Midnight star Kieran Alleyne has split from his pregnant girlfriend. 
The X Factor semi-finalist found out Sophie Johnson was pregnant when the band were at the show’s Judge’s Houses last year. 
However, the pair have now gone their separate ways - just weeks before their baby is due. 
Kieran, who dated for 16 months, says they are still best friends though. Kieran and Girlfriend Sophie (Photo: Instagram) 
He told The Sun : “I know she will be the most amazing mother to our son. I’m looking forward to us starting a new chapter together as great friends and committed parents to our baby boy. 
“We are both incredibly excited to welcome him into the world together.” 5 after Midnight (Photo: Getty) 
While a friend added: "Kieran will still be at the birth and all his fans and friends know how important that is to him." 
A spokeswoman for the band told the newspaper: “We can confirm Kieran and Sophie are no longer together. They remain close friends.” Kieran Alleyne arrives at the ITV Gala 2016 at the London Palladium in London, UK (Photo: Splash) 
Back in December Kieran, whose father walked out on him, his mother and his four siblings when Kieran was just 13 years old, admitted he was “scared” of becoming a father at 21 - but said he’s ready to step up because his first child is “a blessing”. 
“I am scared because I’m only 21 but I’m ready to step up,” he told The Sun On Sunday . Kieran Alleyne's girlfriend Sophie is pregnant (Photo: Instagram/kieranalleyne) 
“It really shocked me and caught me off guard. But there was never any conversation about not going through with it. It’s a blessing, not a curse.” 
Meanwhile, despite not winning the show, the pair still managed to secure a deal with Simon Cowell 's Syco record label. Like us on Facebook
